text: Thomas Reeves may refer to: *Thomas Reeves (VC) (1828–1862), English recipient of the Victoria Cross *Thomas James Reeves (1895–1941), US Navy radioman *Thomas C. Reeves (born 1936), US historian ==See also== *Thomas Reeve (1673–1737), British justice *Thomas Reeve (divine) (1594–1672), English royalist and Anglican divine
title: Thomas Reeves
